lavalink.title: Lavalink 통계

invite.content: 아래 버튼을 클릭하여 저를 초대할 수 있어요. 버그나 중단 문제가 있나요? 서포트 서버에 참여하세요!

help.content: 안녕하세요! 저는 [Lavamusic](https://github.com/appujet/lavamusic)과 Discord로 만들어진 {bot} 음악 봇이에요. `{prefix}help <command>`를 사용하여 명령어에 대한 자세한 정보를 얻을 수 있어요.
help.title: 도움말 메뉴
help.footer: 명령어에 대한 자세한 정보를 얻으려면 {prefix}help <command>를 사용하세요.

fields.creator: Creator
fields.description: He really wanted to make his first open source project ever for more coding experience. In this project, he was challenged to make a project with fewer bugs. Hope you enjoy using LavaMusic!

247.description: Set the bot to stay in the voice channel

errors.not_in_voice: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.generic: An error occurred while trying to execute this command.

messages.enabled: **24/7 mode has been enabled. The bot will not leave the voice channel even if there are no people in the voice channel.**

dj.description: Manage the DJ mode and associated roles

messages.role_exists: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already added.
messages.role_added: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been added.
messages.role_not_found: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is not added.
messages.role_removed: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been removed.
messages.all_roles_cleared: All DJ roles have been removed.
messages.toggle: The DJ mode has been toggled to {status}.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove

prefix.description: Shows or sets the bot's prefix

errors.prefix_too_long: The prefix cannot be longer than 3 characters.

messages.current_prefix: The prefix for this server is `{prefix}`
messages.prefix_set: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`
messages.prefix_reset: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set
options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default one

errors.channel_exists: The song request channel already exists.
errors.channel_not_exists: The song request channel doesn't exist.
errors.channel_delete_fail: The song request channel has been deleted. If the channel is not deleted normally, please delete it yourself.

messages.channel_created: The song request channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: The song request channel has been deleted.

messages.filter_enabled: Bassboost filter has been enabled. **Be careful, listening too loudly can damage your hearing!**

options.pitch: The number you want to set the pitch to (between 0.5 and 5)

errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

rate.description: Change the rate of the song

options.rate: The number you want to set the rate to (between 0.5 and 5)

errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

speed.description: Change the speed of the song

options.speed: The speed you want to set

messages.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

grab.description: Grabs the current playing song on your DM
grab.dm_failed: I couldn't send you a DM.

join.no_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

leave.not_in_channel: I'm not in a voice channel.

loop.description: Loop the current song or the queue

play.description: Plays a song from YouTube, Spotify or http

options.song: The song you want to play

errors.search_error: There was an error while searching.
errors.queue_too_long: The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.
errors.playlist_too_long: The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} songs.

playnext.description: Add the song to play next in queue

options.song: The song you want to play

errors.search_error: There was an error while searching.
errors.queue_too_long: The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.
errors.playlist_too_long: The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} songs.

playnext.added_to_play_next: Added [{title}]({uri}) to play next in the queue.
playnext.added_playlist_to_play_next: Added {length} songs to play next in the queue.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue

options.song: The song number you want to remove

errors.no_songs: There are no songs in the queue.
errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid song number.

messages.removed: Removed song number {songNumber} from the queue.

errors.not_seekable: Cannot replay this track as it is not seekable.

options.song: The song you want to search

errors.search_error: There was an error while searching.

seek.description: Seeks to a certain time in the song

errors.invalid_format: Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
errors.beyond_duration: Cannot seek beyond the song duration of {{length}}.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue

messages.stopped: Stopped the music and cleared the queue.

volume.description: Sets the volume of the player

options.number: The volume you want to set

messages.too_low: The volume can't be lower than 0.
messages.too_high: The volume can't be higher than 200. Do you want to damage your hearing or speakers? Hmmm, I don't think that's such a good idea.

addsong.description: Adds a song to the playlist

options.playlist: The playlist you want to add
options.song: The song you want to add

messages.name_too_long: Playlist names can only be 50 characters long.
messages.playlist_exists: A playlist with that name already exists. Please use a different name.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete

list.description: Retrieves all playlists for the user

options.user: The user whose playlists you want to retrieve

messages.error: An error occurred while retrieving the playlists.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load

removesong.description: Removes a song from the playlist

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from
options.song: The song you want to remove

messages.error_occurred: An error occurred while removing the song.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists

options.playlist: The playlist you want to steal
options.user: The user from whom you want to steal the playlist

messages.playlist_not_exist: That playlist doesn't exist for the mentioned user.
messages.error_occurred: An error occurred while stealing the playlist.

errors.no_player: There is no active player in this guild.
errors.no_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.no_previous: There are no previous songs in the queue.
errors.no_song: There are no songs in the queue.

trackStart.author: Author
trackStart.not_connected_to_voice_channel: You are not connected to <#{channel}> to use these buttons.
trackStart.need_dj_role: You need to have the DJ role to use this command.
trackStart.no_more_songs_in_queue: There is no more song in the queue.

interaction.setup_channel: You can't use this command in the setup channel.
interaction.no_send_message:
I don't have **`SendMessage`** permission in `{guild}`
channel: {channel}.
interaction.no_permission: I don't have enough permissions to execute this command.
interaction.no_user_permission: You don't have enough permissions to use this command.
interaction.no_voice_channel: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this `{command}` command.
interaction.no_connect_permission: I don't have `CONNECT` permissions to execute this `{command}` command.
interaction.no_speak_permission: I don't have `SPEAK` permissions to execute this `{command}` command.
interaction.no_request_to_speak: I don't have `REQUEST TO SPEAK` permission to execute this `{command}` command.
interaction.different_voice_channel: You are not connected to {channel} to use this `{command}` command.
interaction.no_dj_permission: You need to have the DJ role to use this command.
interaction.cooldown: Please wait {time} more second(s) before reusing the `{command}` command.

message.prefix_mention:
Hey, my prefix for this server is `{prefix}`. Want more info? then do `{prefix}help`
Stay Safe, Stay Awesome!
message.no_send_message:
I don't have **`SendMessage`** permission in `{guild}`
channel: {channel}.
message.no_permission: I don't have enough permissions to execute this command.
message.no_user_permission: You don't have enough permissions to use this command.
message.no_voice_channel: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this `{command}` command.
message.no_connect_permission: I don't have `CONNECT` permissions to execute this `{command}` command.
message.no_speak_permission: I don't have `SPEAK` permissions to execute this `{command}` command.
message.no_request_to_speak: I don't have `REQUEST TO SPEAK` permission to execute this `{command}` command.
message.different_voice_channel: You are not connected to {channel} to use this `{command}` command.
message.no_dj_permission: You need to have the DJ role to use this command.
message.cooldown: Please wait {time} more second(s) before reusing the `{command}` command.
message.no_mention_everyone: You can't use this command with everyone or here.
message.no_voice_channel_queue: You are not connected to a voice channel to queue songs.
message.no_permission_connect_speak: I don't have enough permission to connect/speak in <#{channel}>.
message.different_voice_channel_queue: You are not connected to <#{channel}> to queue songs.

setupButton.no_voice_channel_button: You are not connected to a voice channel to use this button.
setupButton.different_voice_channel_button: You are not connected to {channel} to use these buttons.
setupButton.no_dj_permission: You need to have the DJ role to use this command.
setupButton.no_music_to_skip: There is no music to skip.
setupButton.rewind_limit: You cannot rewind the music more than the length of the song.
setupButton.forward_limit: You cannot forward the music more than the length of the song.
